snippet.title: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent -Trailer-
snippet.description:
From the world of Class of Heroes, comes a classic strategy RPG!
Whether you win or lose, that's down to you! Grab your students and grab your victory!
Official Page: https://totomono.acquire.co.jp/quest/eng/
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1904730/

Title: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent
Genre: Strategy RPG
Release Date: 2022/12/09 
Single Player
Platform: Steam, Nintendo Switch™, PS4

Rating: CERO A (All ages)
